titleStmt.title: Citt and Bumpkin in a dialogue over a pot of ale concerning matters of religion and government
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: A reply to Charles Blount's Appeal from the country to the city. Cf. Kitchen, G. Sir Roger L'Estrange, p. 255-256.
A second part was published in the same year.
